title: [Large-scale] Team-Based Learning (TBL) Simulation Education for Enhancing Interprofessional Collaboration in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and understanding of the importance of interdisciplinary collaboration
context.additional_context: Comprises a mixed group of students and job seekers from various medical-related departments, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% participation in team-based problem-solving processes through three core sessions (patient safety, professional ethics, health system disparities)
Learners demonstrate the effectiveness of collaborative learning by improving TRAT scores by 20% or more compared to IRAT in individual and team assessments
Learners rate interdisciplinary communication and collaboration competencies at 4.5 or higher on a 5-point scale in VR simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
